hero.title: Full Stack
hero.subtitle: Developer
hero.description: A Systems Engineering student passionate about building end-to-end web solutions. I love experimenting with new technologies and constantly growing as a developer.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Explore a selection of my work, where I've gained practical experience developing and contributing to web solutions for clients and organizations.

0.title: Alkitab (old version)
0.description: The platform was designed to connect individuals in Kyrgyzstan with Christian resources. My responsibilities included implementing new features and ensuring the application's functionality and accessibility.

1.title: Ediciones Lucentia
1.description: Developed a static landing page for a publishing house, effectively showcasing their catalog of books, e-books, and audiobooks. The site was built to provide an engaging and informative user experience, serving as a primary online presence for sales and outreach.

2.title: Adventist On The Map
2.description: Developed a public online directory designed for a client to effectively manage and showcase a curated network of Adventist professionals offering various services.

3.title: Profeteia
3.description: Developed and customized an e-commerce and personal blog website for a client selling virtual products. My work focused on configuring the site for intuitive user experience and a robust system to manage virtual product sales and content delivery.

4.title: The Friends Language Club
4.description: My initial web application project, designed as a platform to connect language learners with native speakers for practice and cultural exchange. This endeavor provided comprehensive hands-on experience in core web development principles, from conceptualization and design to implementation and problem-solving.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: I am continuously expanding my understanding of these technologies, actively exploring new ones and building upon my foundational knowledge across various development domains.

experience.title: My Experience
